body: What is Keikos Fine Reserve X.0.? Keikos is a blend of tradition and excellence crafted from organically grown sugarcane.

title: January
body: NOTES January February March April May June July August September October November December

Address: 64 Marketplace, Providenciales. Keikos Fine Reserve X.O. is born from a vision of excellenceâ€”an award-worthy Turks and Caicos Islands rum crafted from organic sugarcane juice and distilled using the French Cognac tradition. Aged in French oak barrels, it reveals refined notes of vanilla, caramel, spice, and wood for a smooth, enduring finish. A true expression of craftsmanship, heritage, and island sophistication. Available at IGA Supermarket, IGA Gourmet, Blue Haven's Cafe & Convenient Store, GK Food Store, and Alex Supermarket. For more information call: 649 346 3429.
